title: Bugsplat error
body: Does anyone know how to fix the issue of when entering a game after the pre-game lobby I bugsplat instantly and when attempting to reconnect it immediately crashes again and again. Even after restarting client multiple times this continually happens and am unable to join game. Please help I have lost 50LP for no reason due to this bug.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
Doing  that at the moment. Its so frustrating losing 60LP now and having to play through now 2 leaver busters when im not really doing anything wrong.
Im hoping it works considering it had to go through a number of files thus taking a long time, hopefully the problem is fixed. I will let you know if it happens again.
Repairing did not help. I have also uninstalled and reinstalled and this did not work either
